T02D3538:179a-1: parna sha pa ri s'a dha nam /
T02D3538:179a-3: ri khrod lo ma can gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3538:179a-4: 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3538:179a-5: sngon ma bzhin du thams cad bsgrubs nas rang gi
T02D3538:179a-6: snying gar padma dkar po dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3538:179a-7: la pam yig ser po las skyes pa'i rdo rje'o
T02D3538:179a-8: // de'i lte ba la pam yig go //
T02D3538:179a-9: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gsum pa /
T02D3538:179b-2: g-yon dmar po 'gying zhing bzhad pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3538:179b-3: lo ma dang rma bya'i mdongs kyi sham thabs can /
T02D3538:179b-4: lang tsho gzhon zhing rgyas pa /
T02D3538:179b-5: phyag g-yas rnams kyis rdo rje dang /
T02D3538:179b-8: phyag g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02D3538:179b-9: yal ga dang bcas pa'i rma bya'i mdongs dang /
T02D3538:179b-11: me tog bcings pa'i ral pa'i cod pan la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa 'chang ba /
T02D3538:179b-13: 'og tu bgegs rnams mnan pa'i padma dkar po dang zla ba'i gdan la g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3538:179b-14: thugs kar g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis 'og gi bgegs kyi tshogs skrag par mdzad pa'o //
T02D3538:179b-15: g-yas rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis mtshon cha 'phyar ba'i tshul /
T02D3538:179b-16: de bzhin du phyag bzhi'i g-yon pa dag gis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02D3538:179b-17: lo ma dang bcas pa'i rma bya'i mdongs bsnams pa /
T02D3538:179b-18: phyag g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang /
T02D3538:179b-20: shin tu 'jigs pa ster bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3538:179b-21: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3538:179b-22: aom pi sh'i tsi parna sha ba ri sarba ma r'i pra sha ma ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3538:179b-23: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs nas ci bder gnas par bya'o //
